text:
Dazerolab is an Italian startup
made up of young and dynamic

people with a special focus
on cloud application.

At Dazerolab, we concentrate
on creating software AI-powered

to assist businesses in increasing
their client centricity.

We also provide custom services
for cloud migration,

integration of AI, productivity
and productive technologies.

Our collaboration with AWS
has been crucial for our growth.

When Dazerolab was founded
10 years ago,

AWS already was the leader
in cloud computing.

And we started
by using AWS services

like Amazon Lambda
and Amazon S3.
We employ AI in Dazerolab

for a variety of products,
including implant projects.

The AI algorithms
that we have developed

help dentists with dental
implant procedures

by analyzing images
and patient data.

The service is meant
to automate order entry

in the CRM system
and cross-checking data.

Additionally, it increases
customer experiences

through sophisticated
chatbot and document processors

resulting in more accurate
and efficient business operations.

We also developed a platform
called Bot Master that uses

generative AI, powered by Amazon
Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker.

Last month we processed
up to 1 million pages

and cut the processing time
per contract
from 10 minutes to 30 seconds.

We are an ISV partner
and now we are also
a Subcontractor ProServe partner.

And with this program,
we can work with AWS
on the client's part.
